column4: I am stuck, I loaded ubuntu 10.10 and as it loads for first run the graphics card will not load right. I can see the very top of the desktop and the mouse move around at the top, but the rest is blanked out. using nvidea geforce 8300. anybody seen this before?
I did get the updates but I will do it again. HOw do I load the proprietary updates not being able to see the desk top? is there a safe mode or something? Sorry, I am new to linux.
I acnt get to the terminal, I can't see the desktop
do alt-f2 ... then type jockey-gtk <enter> wait 1min then press tab twice and <enter> wait 20sec enter your password <enter> ... wait 2min then reboot
